properties.entry: INSERT TABLEFLOW (CDICFILESTATUS, CUSTDATE, STARTER, INITUSERID, INITDATETIME, INITSTATUS) VALUES (:CDICFileStatus, :custDate, :starter, :initUserId, :initDateTime, :initStatus);
UPDATE CDICFILESTS SET STATUS = :status, CONFIRMER = :confirmer, CONFIRMDATETIME = :confirmDateTime;
UPDATE HOSTFILESTS SET HOSTDATETIME = :hostDateTime, COPYDATETIME = :copyDateTime, PROCESSUSER = :processUser, STATUS = :status;
UPDATE HOSTFILESTS SET STATUS = :status, HOSTDATETIME = :hostDateTime, COPYDATETIME = :copyDateTime, PROCESSUSER = :processUser WHERE NAME = :name;
UPDATE CDICFILESTS SET STATUS = :status, PROCESSUSER = :processUser, UPLOADDATETIME = :uploadDateTime WHERE NAME = :name;
INSERT LOCALFILESTS (NAME, UPLOADDATETIME, PROCESSUSER, STATUS) VALUES (:name, :uploadDateTime, :processUser, :status);
UPDATE CDICFILESTS SET STATUS = :status, CONFIRMER = :confirmer, CONFIRMDATETIME = :confirmDateTime WHERE FILENO = :fileNo;
SELECT * FROM CDICFILESTS ORDER BY FILENO;
